import os
from oagi.sync_client import SyncClient
from oagi.short_task import ShortTask

# Test SyncClient with env vars
client = SyncClient()
print(''✓ SyncClient created from environment variables'')
print(f''  base_url: {client.base_url}'')
print(f''  api_key: {client.api_key}'')
client.close()

# Test ShortTask with env vars
task = ShortTask()
print(''✓ ShortTask created from environment variables'')
print(f''  base_url: {task.base_url}'')
print(f''  api_key: {task.api_key}'')
task.close()

# Test parameter override
task_override = ShortTask(base_url=''https://override.example.com'', api_key=''override-key'')
print(''✓ ShortTask created with parameter override'')
print(f''  base_url: {task_override.base_url}'')
print(f''  api_key: {task_override.api_key}'')
task_override.close()
